front.p: Haast to Gore, 22-7-1881, Te Papa MU000094/005/0221.

body.p: I wrote lately to Mr Stansell to let me have the readings of the Barometer without any corrections & the thermometer from 30 th Decb 1876 to 14 th January 1877, wind etc. as I want to calculate the altitudes of several positions I visited at that time. However he tells me that he has returned the books to Wellingt on. Will you be good enough to send them to me.

Please remind Dr Hector of his promise to send me a plaster cast of Colenso’s Bell & Sir G Grey’s stone idol. I have got a cast made of Major Wilson’s stone bird & place one at the disposal of the Colonial Museum.
